sql.where:
p.delete_flag=0 and p.store_id=#{storeId}
and p.name like #{nameLike}

mapper.select: select count(*) from sale_act p LEFT JOIN sys_store ss ON p.store_id = ss.id

select p.id, p.name, p.carousel, ss.name AS store_name from sale_act p LEFT JOIN sys_store ss ON p.store_id = ss.id
order by p.id desc

select p.id,p.name,p.base_price,p.category_id,c.name categoryName from sale_act p left join sys_act_category c on c.id=p.category_id
order by p.id desc
